name: Hay
description: Dried grass used as animal food.

name: Shears
description: Use this to collect wool from sheep

name: Chicken
description: Well cared-for chickens lay eggs every day. Lives in the coop.

name: Cow
description: Can be milked daily. A milk pail is required to harvest the milk. Lives in the barn.

name: Goat
description: Happy provide goat milk every other day. A milk pail is required to harvest the milk. Lives in the barn.

name: Duck
description: Happy lay duck eggs every other day. Lives in the coop.

name: Sheep
description: Can be shorn for wool. A pair of shears is required to harvest the wool. Lives in the barn.

name: Rabbit
description: These are wooly rabbits! They shed precious wool every few days. Lives in the coop.

name: Dinosaur
description: The Dinosaur is a farm animal that lives in a Big Coop

name: Pig
description: These pigs are trained to find truffles! Lives in the barn.
